column2: We have, over the last 24 hours, seen an unhelpful focus on one individual consignment coming from [MASK]. We are told that this consignment is still stuck

London hospitals are getting through 30,000 to 40,000 a day and major teaching hospital trusts, such as [MASK]’s in Cambridge and University Hospitals Birmingham need to use 3,000 to 4,000 each day, such is the demand caused by the pandemic.

It occupies a narrow townhouse on [MASK] Street, just north of Oxford Street, so that each floor’s dining room has about it the classy glow of a vintage train’s dining car.

a simple café, all plywood and painted brick walls, knocking out huge plates of big-flavoured [MASK] food at the sort of prices that restore your faith not just in eating out, but quite possibly in humanity in general.

If you want to work yourself up into a spittle-flecked rage over the £15 or so charged here for a starter and the £32 charged for a main course, get it out of your system now. Froth for [MASK]. Froth like the wind.
We drink a bottle of something crisp from [MASK], because I’m going there this summer and need to get the training in.

On another plate there are artichokes deep-fried in what the Romans refer to as the “[MASK] style”, the outer leaves crisped and fragile, alongside thick discs of long-braised pig that has been breaded and deep fried.
